com.clarionmedia.infinitum.activity

Class InfinitumActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity
            • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.activity.InfinitumActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, EventPublisher

    public class InfinitumActivity
extends android.app.Activity
implements EventPublisher

    This Activity extension takes care of framework initialization, provides support for resource injection and event binding, and exposes an InfinitumContext.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 07/18/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat
    See Also:
    InfinitumListActivity, InfinitumFragmentActivity
